text:
Message 543 of 4024
Do you check work email? We are addressing a very serious issue right now and it has some urgency. I would like to know how to communicate with
you in a way that doesn’t take 24 hours to respond. Please let me know if work email is better, I’m happy to do that, but would prefer not to.
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:26 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock
Message 544 of 4024
Threats to work email are unacceptable.
I will reach out to Dr Brown and ask for guidance
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:26 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:28 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock
Message 545 of 4024
Wait. I did not say I was threatening you. That is what you said. No big deal though.All I’m asking for is a way that we can communicate more
quickly and effectively on our son’s mental health. I’m not trying to fight at all. But when we chat you interrupt and then hang up. We need to do
better and I should have access to my son’s mental health concerns. That is all I am saying.
And I’m not fighting about Dr Brown. Let’s do it. But I think the way you are mandating a unilateral mental health decision is not right. I would like
some way to collaborate on his mental health. It’s like if we need to make other health decisions. Or to a much lesser extent something as simple as his
school choice or religious freedom. But these are the types of decisions we should make together.
That’s all I’m saying. And I don’t want to make a fuss. So please let me know how we work collaboratively like we did so well all day in a timely
manner, especially for the health and welfare of our children. I’m their Dad. Until I’m not, it’s a reasonable ask.
Can we work together please?
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:35 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:47 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock
Message 546 of 4024
The Kirkland xfinity account was under both our names.
I have requested updating the Kirkland Xfinity account for change of ownership to just be me under my name, my email, my cell phone. This is in
process.
The Alki and Bellevue xfinity accounts are under your name only so I do not have access to them.
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:36 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:41 PM)
Subject:Kirkland xfinity account
